version_description:
Thanks for using our app. We’re constantly improving it, and adding new features. We’ll let you know about them right here.

So what have we done?

Under the hood updates - to improve performance
Bug fixes – so your journey is smoother

* Manage, change and cancel your Annual Service visit
* Add the contact number of whoever will be at home on the day
* Check your HomeCare cover
* Bug fixes
Minor updates

- You can now register and begin using an online account from within our app
- A simple way to login without a password using an SMS activation code
- Under the hood updates - to improve performance
- Bug fixes - so your journey is smoother

You can buy cover for your home with HomeCare One to Four.

Under the hood updates - to improve performance.

Bug fixes - we’ve ironed out kinks so the app runs quicker and smoother.

* Book your first service with HomeCare.
* Speak to an agent with our Live Chat feature.
* Under-the-hood updates to improve performance.
* Bug fixes – we’ve ironed out kinks so the app runs quicker and smoother.

* Book your first service with HomeCare.
* Speak to an agent with our Live Chat feature.
* Under-the-hood updates to improve performance.
* Bug fixes – we’ve ironed out kinks so the app runs quicker and smoother.

* Book one-off boiler and heating repairs.
* Bug fixes.

* Book a boiler and heating repair with on-going cover.
* Bug fixes.

If you’ve got cover with us, you can now book an engineer in a few taps.

We’ve also rolled out in-app notifications to help you manage your account.

* Buy cover for your home and appliances in a few taps.
* Claim discounts, giveaways and prizes with Rewards.
* Bug fixes – we’ve ironed out kinks so the app runs quicker and smoother.

* If you’re a Smart Pay As You Go customer, you can now top up your smart pre-pay meters.
* If you’re an eligible customer, you can see your energy usage in near real time with Live Energy.
* Bug fixes – we’ve ironed out kinks so the app runs quicker and smoother.

* Buy cover for your home and appliances in a few taps.
* Claim discounts, giveaways and prizes with Rewards.
* Bug fixes – we’ve ironed out kinks so the app runs quicker and smoother.

- Slicker home screen for easy navigation (we'd love to hear your feedback in app)

- Quick links (perfect if you're in a hurry)

- Live chat enhancements
Performance update and bug fixes

● Apple and Google Pay for Smart PAYG customers
● Ask us a question in live chat. If we’re not around, we’ll notify you when we’re back online
● Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Fixed direct debit customers can now adjust their monthly payment amount
- Rewards members will now be notified of a prize draw win
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

• An enhanced home screen for a clearer view of your cover products
• Bug fixes for a smoother experience

• See your tariff details in just a few taps
• Moving home? Get the ball rolling on our app
• Plus, we’ve fixed a few bugs for a smoother experience

• An enhanced home screen for a clearer view of your cover products
• Bug fixes for a smoother experience

• It’s Christmaaaaas! Well, almost. So stuff the turkey and see if you can win big with our new game, Wilbur’s Merry Mission. There are 25,000 prizes up for grabs.
• Also, our elves (developers) have been busy in the workshop (our office in Staines), making sure our app is running as slick as Santa’s sleigh (they’ve fixed a few bugs).

Turns out some people think shopping for energy tariffs isn’t a bundle of fun. So we’ll keep this short...

You can now buy bundles on our app. Basically, we take our energy tariffs and bundle them up with a little something extra, like boiler cover. So yeah, not exactly fun. But it could help you save, er, a bundle.

Nobody wants to spend hours and hours on an energy app. (Except our developers, but that’s because we pay them.) You want to get in, do your thing, and get back to crushing candies.

So we’ve spruced up our home screen to give you a quick glance of your services. We’ve also tweaked our chat feature, so you can connect to our customer service team faster than before.

We're really sorry if you've had a few problems using our app lately.

We've taken your feedback on board and ironed out the kinks to give you a better experience. If you hit any more snags, tap ‘Message us’ and we’ll be happy to help.

Our tech team has spent lockdown getting rid of annoying bugs – appropriately enough.

Here’s what’s new for this release:

- a smoother in-app messaging experience
- bug fixes when booking an engineer
- bug fixes when viewing live usage

If you hit any problems, just tap ‘Message us’ in the main menu and we’ll get on the case.

We’ve been busy fixing bugs to bring you a smoother experience.
And adding reminders to reschedule appointments if anyone at home feels unwell.
Any questions? Tap ‘Message us’ from the menu and let’s chat.

We’ve been busy fixing bugs to bring you a smoother experience.
And adding reminders to reschedule appointments if anyone at home feels unwell.
Any questions? Tap ‘Message us’ from the menu and let’s chat.

Better information on how we save your card details.
A smoother chat experience and a bonus batch of bug fixes.

Pro tip: switch on notifications so you never miss a thing.

Better information on how we save your card details.
A smoother chat experience and a bonus batch of bug fixes.

Pro tip: switch on notifications so you never miss a thing.

Security tweaks to help you choose safer passwords for your account

Plus a bunch of very nifty tech improvements under the hood

Top tip: enable notifications so you never miss a thing

Easier ways to call us if you can't switch tariffs.

Pro tip: Enable notifications so you never miss a thing.

What’s new
· Share up to £100 in Amazon Gift Cards when you refer a friend
· Enjoy a cleaner, simpler support chat experience
· Get better catch-up payment reminders on fixed Direct Debit
PS Enable notifications now so you’ll never miss a thing

We listened to your feedback about improving the login experience. And we acted, so expect a new, smoother experience.

And for new users, our registration process is a breeze.

New look and feel on your My Account page with ability to update contact details.

Top tip: turn on notifications to make sure you don’t miss a thing
